useCase.name: Collaboration with Faculty Members

preconditions.precondition: Researcher has access to the Repository Interface

successEndConditions.condition: Researcher successfully saves/note for collaboration with selected faculty members

useCase.trigger: Researcher initiates collaboration process with faculty members

mainSequence.step: Researcher initiates a search for faculty members
Researcher reviews faculty interests and expertise
Researcher requests detailed information from FacultyProfiles
FacultyProfiles provides detailed information to Researcher
Researcher selects faculty members for collaboration
Researcher saves/notes selected faculty members for collaboration in CollaborationModule
CollaborationModule confirms the action and provides next steps to Researcher
